data.name: AirMech Soundtrack 2: WarMech by Frontline Assembly
data.detailed_description:
The WarMech soundtrack contains 12 dark industrial instrumental tracks, created by Front Line Assembly. It is the second soundtrack for the AirMech universe. Includes exclusive bonus game content for both AirMech Strike and AirMech Wastelands:

FRONTLINE STRIKER

Exclusive Striker variant in a post apocalyptic theme


Designed with input from the band Frontline Assembly, these mech variants have seen it all and keep going back. They are warriors, hardened by what they have seen and what they know they will have to endure to continue to survive.

IMPROVISED ELECTRONIC DEVICE


Similar to a Stasis mine, except this one uses sound waves to
disrupt movement. (Alternate Unit)

ARTIFICIAL SOLDIER


When human soldiers were in short supply, smaller robots were made which could replace humans in operating machines and more easily enter residential areas. Not very tough compared to full combat bots, they definitely had their uses.

HARD WIRED


Special legendary AirMech Part (Wastelands only)

TACTICAL NEURAL IMPLANT


Legendary Pilot Item (Wastelands only)

TRACK LIST

  • 1. Mechvirus 06:33
  • 2. Anthropod 05:45
  • 3. Heatmap 06:21
  • 4. The Imminent 04:54
  • 5. Force Carrier 05:17
  • 6. Meteorfall 06:49
  • 7. Molotov 05:30
  • 8. Rip Sensor 07:31
  • 9. The Eminent 06:11
  • 10. Mechanism 06:07
  • 11. Earthriser 05:48
  • 12. Creator 06:35

data.short_description: The WarMech soundtrack contains 12 dark industrial instrumental tracks, created by Front Line Assembly. It is the second soundtrack for the AirMech universe. Includes exclusive bonus game content: Frontline Striker, Improvised Electronic Device, Artificial Soldier, Hard Wired, Tactical Neural Implant.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
data.reviews:
“While gamers will no doubt be focused on the battle before them, music fans can fully imbibe the sonic storytelling without these distractions and quickly discover themselves lost in a moving and triumphant aural journey.”
4.5/5.0 – Cryptic Rock

“If you compare this to their previous soundtrack for ”Airmech”, this one is a bit more upbeat and dancey, while still being very atmospheric. Some of the best tracks are the slower ones however, like the intensely beautiful ”twin” tracks ”The Imminent” and ”The Eminent”. The synthwave ending track ”The Creator” also fits in this category.”
7/10 – Release Magazine

“It follows an atmospheric odyssey through a lot of dark ambient , creaky post- industrial , EBM, merely hinted aggrotech, trance and a pinch of pop. (translated from German)”
Laut

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7
  • Processor:Intel i3
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Less than 5 year old GPU
  • DirectX®:11.0
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Sound:Yes
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 10
  • Processor:Intel i5 (quad core or better)
  • Memory:8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:GTX 660 or Radeon 7970
  • DirectX®:11.0
  • Hard Drive:4 GB HD space
  • Sound:Yes
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

data.legal_notice: © 2011-2018 Carbon Games inc. AirMech is a trademark of Carbon Games inc in the United States and other countries. All tracks composed and produced by Bill Leeb, Jared Slingerland, Sasha Keevill, Craig Johnsen, and Jeremy Inkel. Additional samples provided by Jason Bazinet. Original album artwork by Dave McKean. Mixed by Greg Reely.
